commit.message:
gensupport.c (process_rtx): Copy and post-process each member of the define_insn rtvec individually.

        * gensupport.c (process_rtx): Copy and post-process each member
        of the define_insn rtvec individually.

From-SVN: r33780

files.patch:

 	of existance.
 
+	* gensupport.c (process_rtx): Copy and post-process each member
+	of the define_insn rtvec individually.
